Name: Title
Description: This a characteristic, and often unique, name by which the resource is known.

Name: Summary
Description: This is a brief narrative summary of the content of the resource.

Name: Project
Description: Project name

Name: Institution
Description: Project institutions

Name: References
Description: webpage of responsible party

Name: Contact
Description: This is the description of the organisation responsible for the creation and maintenance of the resource

Name: License
Description: Privacy policy and terms of use

Name: Creator_url
Description: webpage of responsible party

Name: Creator_email
Description: email of responsible party

Name: Metadata_version
Description: Metadata version number (1.0.1, ...)

Name: Processing_baseline
Description: Processing version number (0.1.0, ...) also reflected in the filename.

Name: Processing_name
Description: A value uniquely identifying the resource including version, baseline, resolution, composite period

Name: Compositing_period
Description: Specify time period for which mosaic is valid

Name: Processing_steps
Description: Corrections applied to data, e.g., atmospheric, cirrus, terrain, BRDF, and geometric corrections

Name: Processing_configuration
Description: Configuration of process

Name: Resource_locator
Description: web of product

Name: Sensor_list
Description: List of used sensors

Name: Mosaicking_period_start
Description: start date of product

Name: Mosaicking_period_end
Description: end date of product

Name: First_product_date
Description: start date of product in case of more tiles

Name: Last_product_date
Description: end date of product in case of more tiles

Name: Resolution_distance
Description: A resolution distance shall be expressed as a numerical value associated with a unit of length.

Name: Date_of_creation
Description: date of product genertation

Name: Source_product_list
Description: Internal list of input filenames used for production.

Name: Geometry / Image_width
Description: size of resource, number of pixel in x-direction

Name: Geometry / Image_height
Description: size of product, number of pixel in y-direction

Name: Geometry / CRS
Description: coordinate system of resource

Name: Geometry / Projection_parameters
Description: projection parameters

Name: Geometry / Boundary
Description: This is the extent of the resource in the geographic space, given as a bounding box. The bounding box shall be expressed with westbound and eastbound longitudes, and southbound and northbound latitudes in decimal degrees, with a precision of at least two decimals.
